com.camerontec.catalys.server.breakout.policyengine

Class AbstractPolicyEngineMessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.breakout.policyengine.AbstractPolicyEngineMessageHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExampleOrderCancelHandler, ExampleOrderCancelReplaceHandler, ExampleOrderHandler, NullHandler

    public abstract class AbstractPolicyEngineMessageHandler
extends Object
    An abstract message handler. Provides default implementations of the policy methods.
    Author:
    Hugh Emberson

      • onMessageAdded

        public MessageAddedPolicyAction onMessageAdded(HandlerContext context,
                                               BrokenOutMessageData data,
                                               PerSessionIndices indices)
                                        throws MessageException
        Do the work of IBreakOutPolicyEngine.onMessageAdded(com.camerontec.catalys.server.breakout.BrokenOutMessageData). The default implementation indexes the message using the tags returned by getIDTags() and returns a do nothing action (responseMessage and messageToRemove are null).
        Parameters:
        context - context
        data - data
        indices - indices
        Returns:
        a do nothign action
        Throws:
        MessageException - TBD

      • onMessageRemoved

        public void onMessageRemoved(HandlerContext context,
                             BrokenOutMessageData data,
                             PerSessionIndices indices)
                      throws MessageException
        Do the work of IBreakOutPolicyEngine.onMessageRemoved(com.camerontec.catalys.server.breakout.BrokenOutMessageData). The default implementation removes the message from the indices using the tags returned by getIDTags().
        Parameters:
        context - context
        data - message data
        indices - indices
        Throws:
        MessageException - TBD

      • determineRelatedMessageAction

        public RelatedMessagePolicyAction determineRelatedMessageAction(HandlerContext context,
                                                                IFIXMessageProcessor source,
                                                                IFIXMessage mess,
                                                                PerSessionIndices indices)
                                                         throws MessageException
        Do the work of IBreakOutPolicyEngine.determineRelatedMessageAction(com.camerontec.catalys.server.processor.IFIXMessageProcessor, com.camerontec.catalys.core.message.IFIXMessage). The default implementation returns a do nothing action (stopProcessing and breakOut are false, responseMessage and messageToRemove are null)
        Parameters:
        context - context
        source - source message processor
        mess - message
        indices - indices
        Returns:
        a do nothing action
        Throws:
        MessageException - TBD

      • getIDTags

        protected abstract int[] getIDTags()
        Returns:
        the set of tags that we should index this message type on. E.g., an order handler might return [ ClOrdId ].
